Spät entdeckt, aber sofort geliebt. Das Spiel basiert auf einfachen Prinzipien und führt Mechaniken geschickt ein. Die Progression ist spürbar, aber nie unfair.  
Schöne Rätsel,  geschicktes Design, stimmige Atmosphäre und abgründiger Humor - Ein großer Spaß und sehr zu empfehlen!

This game It blew my mind way back in 2007. Felt like revisiting this classic indie darling 13 years after I first came across it.  Finished all the main stuff within 4 hours, and it took me just 2 more hours to finish the advance maps. Its a pretty short game, but still worth it for the puzzles. It has aged pretty well, all things considering. 

Highly recommended.

my IQ has reached it's peak

Well, I finally did it: after playing through countless knockoffs (with varying degrees of quality), I finally played Portal to completion.  It's a neat First-Person Shooter that's all about puzzle solving.  Even though this wasn't my first exposure to the concept by far, it was still pretty fresh.  Puzzles were intuitive, and the gimmick was implemented very well.  Aside from a couple of moments that were a bit ridiculous, everything else was pretty reasonable, and the final puzzle was a great way to cap it all off.  My favorite part was the humor GLaDOS is an absolute treasure made of dark, sarcastic humor, and absolutely the star of the show.  In fact, if I may be so bold, I'd say that most everything she says is funnier than [b]the line[/b].  You know the one.
Quite Epic

Um game de puzzle linear com um método único de resolver os enigmas: uma arma que atira um portal de entrada e um de saída. Falar de Portal é chover no molhado, já que o game se tornou um fenomeno da internet, tão eterno quanto Sonic 2 ou Resident Evil 4. Quer um jogo criativo, divertido e que você zera numa tarde de domingo? Então pegue Portal sem pensar duas vezes.
